Class Sprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.gatech.cs2340.trydent.GameObject
      • edu.gatech.cs2340.trydent.Sprite

  • public class Sprite
extends GameObject
    A class that displays 2D sprite images and can support simple 2D animations.
